name: Lost In Space 2
description:
Humanity ran out of the resources over one hundred years ago. Now we are searching for a new planet to make it our home. Thousands of drones were sent to the newly discovered planets. Oleo15, also called the Ocean Planet by scientists, is another one of them.

Lost in Space is a minimalistic runner-game in which you navigate a drone E-364i sent to discover a newish planet.

Features:
  • atmosphere of peace
  • relaxing background music
  • 5000 Steam achievements
